Title: Dot plot
Description: This is project is the implementation of Bioinformatics dot plot by using WPF, thus resulting in an  enhanced features like selection, functional annotation etc
HomeWiki:
Project Description

This project is under development right now.

Following are the functionalities to be added in project.

  • It will allow users to make a dot plot of two sequences.
  • User interface of Dot plot will be much interactive so that it can allow user to select specific region.
  • User interface will allow user to fetch the sequences of selected regions.
  • Dot plots integrated facility will search “Open reading frame” for the selected region on request by user.
  • There will be a facility for comparison of selected regions (genes) by BLAST on request by user.
  • Functional annotation of the selected genes should be presented in a summarized way.

 Current Status:

  • Current release of the project can draw a dot plot of any two hard coded biological sequences.
  • Window size of the dot plot can be changed in code.
